title: Scholz becomes German leader as Merkel bows out
content: Olaf Scholz is sworn in as chancellor, leading a three-party coalition after 16 years of Merkel rule.

title: Scholz becomes German leader as Merkel bows out
content: Olaf Scholz is sworn in as chancellor, leading a three-party coalition after 16 years of Merkel rule.

title: India's top general in helicopter crash
content: Chief of Defence Staff General Bipin Rawat was in the helicopter which crashed in southern India.

title: Soldiers accused of shooting and burning villagers
content: Myanmar villagers say soldiers carried out the killings in response to an attack on a military convoy.

title: Vaccines should work against Omicron, WHO says
content: A small study in South Africa suggests the new variant could partially evade the Pfizer jab.

title: Finnish PM sorry for clubbing after Covid contact
content: Sanna Marin went on a night out on Saturday, hours after her foreign minister had tested positive.

title: The advent calendar that lets you give back
content: After starting her own reverse advent calendar to help others, Heather Luttrell took the idea nationwide.

title: World's top Covid vaccine maker halves production
content: The Serum Institute is sitting on a stockpile of 500 million doses of Covishield, its CEO said.
